about_the_game:
Boyce the Voice is a captivating narrative rhythm game that follows the exciting adventures of Boyce, a rising voice actor handpicked by a mysterious and curmudgeonly talent manager for reasons unknown. Embark on a journey through six custom levels, unraveling the story as you immerse yourself in the world of Boyce the Voice!



  • Voice act your way through 6 custom levels!
  • Enjoy an immersive narrative journey told through FMV cutscenes!
  • Embark on a whimsical, short play with a captivating story!
  • Master rhythm challenges designed for all skill levels!
  • Encounter unique characters in Boyce's entertaining world!
  • Immerse yourself in a vibrant, fast-paced gaming experience!
  • Unlock challenging bonus stages as you progress!

Boyce the Voice promises an engaging and unique gaming experience that seamlessly blends the art of voice acting with the thrill of rhythm challenges. As players embark on this captivating journey with Boyce, the rising voice actor, they will not only enjoy mastering the intricacies of the custom levels but also unravel a compelling narrative through FMV cutscenes. The quirky short play that respects your time, coupled with encounters with eccentric characters, adds a delightful touch to the overall gaming adventure.

With challenges designed for all skill levels and the opportunity to unlock bonus stages, Boyce the Voice invites players to immerse themselves in a vibrant and fast-paced world, making it a must-play for those seeking a fusion of storytelling and rhythm-based gameplay. Get ready to explore the exciting and mysterious realm of Boyce's voice acting odyssey!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: Zen 2
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2
  • Storage: 969 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: (works great on steamdeck)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS Catalina (10.15)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core i9
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5500M 8 GB
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: only tested on above specs for osx. may work with lower specs but mixed results with beta testers.
